commands.name: az spring connection update app-insights
commands.summary: Update a spring app to app-insights connection.
commands.syntax:
az spring connection update app-insights [--app]
                                         [--appconfig-id]
                                         [--client-type {dotnet, dotnet-internal, go, java, nodejs, none, python}]
                                         [--connection]
                                         [--connstr-props]
                                         [--customized-keys]
                                         [--deployment]
                                         [--id]
                                         [--no-wait]
                                         [--opt-out {auth, configinfo, publicnetwork}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--secret]
                                         [--service]
                                         [--vault-id]
examples: az spring connection update app-insights -g SpringCloudRG --service MySpringService --app MyApp --connection MyConnection --client-type dotnet

az spring connection update app-insights --id /subscriptions/{subscription}/resourceGroups/{source_resource_group}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{site}/providers/Microsoft.ServiceLinker/linkers/{linker} --client-type dotnet

commands.name: az spring connection update appconfig
commands.summary: Update a spring app to appconfig connection.
commands.syntax:
az spring connection update appconfig [--app]
                                      [--appconfig-id]
                                      [--client-type {dotnet, dotnet-internal, java, nodejs, none, python}]
                                      [--connection]
                                      [--connstr-props]
                                      [--customized-keys]
                                      [--deployment]
                                      [--id]
                                      [--no-wait]
                                      [--opt-out {auth, configinfo, publicnetwork}]
                                      [--private-endpoint {false, true}]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--secret]
                                      [--service]
                                      [--service-principal]
                                      [--system-identity]
                                      [--user-identity]
                                      [--vault-id]
examples: az spring connection update appconfig -g SpringCloudRG --service MySpringService --app MyApp --connection MyConnection --client-type dotnet

az spring connection update appconfig --id /subscriptions/{subscription}/resourceGroups/{source_resource_group}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{site}/providers/Microsoft.ServiceLinker/linkers/{linker} --client-type dotnet

commands.name: az spring connection update confluent-cloud
commands.summary: Update a spring app to confluent-cloud connection.
commands.syntax:
az spring connection update confluent-cloud --connection
                                            [--app]
                                            [--appconfig-id]
                                            [--bootstrap-server]
                                            [--client-type {dotnet, dotnet-internal, go, java, none, python, springBoot}]
                                            [--customized-keys]
                                            [--deployment]
                                            [--kafka-key]
                                            [--kafka-secret]
                                            [--no-wait]
                                            [--opt-out {auth, configinfo, publicnetwork}]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--schema-key]
                                            [--schema-registry]
                                            [--schema-secret]
                                            [--service]
                                            [--source-id]
                                            [--vault-id]
examples: az spring connection update confluent-cloud -g SpringCloudRG --service MySpringService --app MyApp --connection MyConnection --client python

az spring connection update confluent-cloud -g SpringCloudRG --service MySpringService --app MyApp --connection MyConnection --bootstrap-server xxx.eastus.azure.confluent.cloud:9092 --kafka-key Name --kafka-secret Secret
az spring connection update confluent-cloud -g SpringCloudRG --service MySpringService --app MyApp --connection MyConnection_schema --client python

az spring connection update confluent-cloud -g SpringCloudRG --service MySpringService --app MyApp --connection MyConnection_schema --schema-registry https://xxx.eastus.azure.confluent.cloud --schema-key Name --schema-secret Secret
